Generated Narrative: StructureDefinition SHINNYBundleProfile

NameFlagsCard.TypeDescription & Constraints
Bundle C0..*BundleContains a collection of resources
SHINNY-Patient-MRN: Every bundle should always have only 1 MR (i.e MRN) Object within patient.identifier, system.contains('facility') and value (MRN) is provided
SHINNY-Patient-MA: Every bundle should always have only 1 Medicaid CIN (i.e MA) Object within patient.identifier
SHINNY-Patient-SSN: Every bundle should always have only 1 SSN (i.e SS) Object within patient.identifier
SHINNY-Patient-Address: All elements of address should be present
SHINNY-Patient-DOB: birthDate should be a valid date
SHINNY-Patient-Gender: Gender should be present
SHINNY-Patient-GenderId: Gender Id should be present
SHINNY-Patient-Race-Ethnicity: Race & Ethnicity should be present
SHINNY-Patient-Communication: Communication should exist
SHINNY-Patient-MiddleName: MiddleName should be present
SHINNY-Patient-Pronouns: Pronouns should be present
shinny-sexual-orientation: If there is no component or hasMember element then either a value[x] or a data absent reason must be present
SHINNY-Bundle-Obs-hasMember-RI: Checks for RI between Observation & child Observations
SHINNY-Encounter-Class: Ensure that the Encounter resource has a class code; Ensure that the Encounter resource has a class code system
SHINNY-Encounter-Type: Ensure that the Encounter resource has a status code
Encounter-PeriodStart: Ensure that all Encounters include a value for period.start.
Encounter-PeriodEnd: Ensure that all finished Encounters include a value for period.end.
SHINNY-Obs-Encounter: SDOH Observations should have an Encounter
SHINNY-Obs-Patient: SDOH Observations should have a Patient
SHINNY-Obs-Code: Ensure that all Observation resources have screening code; Ensure that all Observation resources have screening code system
SHINNY-Obs-Category: Ensure that all Observation categories have an SDOH code
SHINNY-Screening-Patient: SDOH Screening Observations should have an Patient
ObservationScreenRes-Langauge: Ensure that all Observation Screening Responses have a language.
ObservationScreenRes-CategoryDisplay: Ensure that all Observation Screening Responses have a category display.
ObservationScreenRes-CodeCode: Ensure that all Observation Screening Responses have a code code.
ObservationScreenRes-CodeDisplay: Ensure that all Observation Screening Responses have a code dispay.
ObservationScreenRes-Interpretation: Ensure that specific Observation Screening Responses have an interpretation.
Assessment-ConditionID: Ensure that all final assessments have a Condition identifier.
Assessment-ConditionSNOMED: Ensure that all final assessments have a Condition category SNOMED term.
Assessment-ConditionICD10: Ensure that all final assessments have a Condition ICD-10 term.
Assessment-ApprovalQuestionnaire: Ensure that all Assessment Questionnaire bundles have a response to PatientAssessmentApproval.
Assessment-OutreachQuestionnaire: Ensure that all Assessment Questionnaire bundles with patient approval contain a Patient Assessment Outreach Date and a Patient Assessment Status.
Assessment-AdminQuestionnaire: Ensure that all Assessment Questionnaire bundles have a response to the service duplication indicators.
Assessment-ServiceDupQuestionnaire: Ensure that all Assessment Questionnaire bundles have a response to the service duplication indicators.
SHINNY-Assessment-Encounter: Assessment-Encounter should exist
SHINNY-Assessment-Patient: Assessment-Subject should exist
ServiceRequest-Quantity: Ensure that all Service Requests have a quantity.
ServiceRequest-CategoryCode: Ensure that all Service Requests have a category code.
ServiceRequest-OccurrencePeriod: Ensure that all Service Requests have an occurrence period start and end, or occurrence datetime.
ServiceRequest-AuthoredOn: Ensure that all Service Requests have a authored on date.
Task-StatusReason: Ensure that all tasks exists, have a statusReason If the Task.status is rejected, cancelled, on-hold, or failed.
Task-Repetitions: Ensure that all Tasks have a value for repetitions.
Task-EndPeriod: Ensure that all completed Tasks have an end execution period.
Task-StartPeriod: Ensure that all Tasks have a starting execution period.
Referral-ApprovalQuestionnaire: Ensure that all Referral Questionnaire bundles have a response to PatientReferralApproval.
Referral-HRSNOutreachQuestionnaire: Ensure that all approved Referral Questionnaire bundles have a response to HRSNServiceProviderReferralOutreachDate.
Referral-SCNOutreachQuestionnaire: Ensure that all approved Referral Questionnaire bundles have a response to SCNReferralOutreachDate.
SHINNY-Bundle-Required-Resources: Every bundle should always have one and only one 'Patient' & 'Encounter' and atleast one Org
SHINNY-Bundle-Required: Every submitted resource should be part of a bundle.
SHINNY-Bundle-Patient-Org-RI: Checks for RI between Patient & Assigning Org
SHINNY-Bundle-Patient-Encounter-RI: Checks for RI between Patient & Encounter
SHINNY-Bundle-Encounter-Location-RI: Checks for RI between Encounter & Location
SHINNY-Bundle-Obs-derivedFrom-RI: Checks for RI between Observation & child Observation
SHINNY-Bundle-Obs-Patient-RI: Checks for RI between Obs & Patient
SHINNY-Bundle-Obs-Encounter-RI: Checks for RI between Screening Obs & Encounter

SHINNY-Consent-Category: Patient Consent category code is 59284-0
Consent-ProvisionType: Ensure that all Consents include a value for provision type.

name: SHINNYBundleProfile
title: SHINNY Bundle Profile
description:
* SHINNY HRSN: Needed for submission of all FHIR profiles.
* Extends and restricts [base FHIR](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/bundle.html): A container for a collection of resources.

element.definition: A container for a collection of resources.

constraint.human: total only when a search or history
constraint.expression: total.empty() or (type = 'searchset') or (type = 'history')

constraint.human: entry.search only when a search
constraint.expression: entry.search.empty() or (type = 'searchset')

constraint.human: entry.request mandatory for batch/transaction/history, otherwise prohibited
constraint.expression: entry.all(request.exists() = (%resource.type = 'batch' or %resource.type = 'transaction' or %resource.type = 'history'))

constraint.human: entry.response mandatory for batch-response/transaction-response/history, otherwise prohibited
constraint.expression: entry.all(response.exists() = (%resource.type = 'batch-response' or %resource.type = 'transaction-response' or %resource.type = 'history'))

constraint.human: FullUrl must be unique in a bundle, or else entries with the same fullUrl must have different meta.versionId (except in history bundles)
constraint.expression: (type = 'history') or entry.where(fullUrl.exists()).select(fullUrl&resource.meta.versionId).isDistinct()
constraint.xpath: (f:type/@value = 'history') or (count(for $entry in f:entry[f:resource] return $entry[count(parent::f:Bundle/f:entry[f:fullUrl/@value=$entry/f:fullUrl/@value and ((not(f:resource/*/f:meta/f:versionId/@value) and not($entry/f:resource/*/f:meta/f:versionId/@value)) or f:resource/*/f:meta/f:versionId/@value=$entry/f:resource/*/f:meta/f:versionId/@value)])!=1])=0)

constraint.human: A document must have an identifier with a system and a value
constraint.expression: type = 'document' implies (identifier.system.exists() and identifier.value.exists())

constraint.human: A document must have a date
constraint.expression: type = 'document' implies (timestamp.hasValue())

constraint.human: A document must have a Composition as the first resource
constraint.expression: type = 'document' implies entry.first().resource.is(Composition)

constraint.human: A message must have a MessageHeader as the first resource
constraint.expression: type = 'message' implies entry.first().resource.is(MessageHeader)

constraint.human: Every bundle should always have only 1 MR (i.e MRN) Object within patient.identifier, system.contains('facility') and value (MRN) is provided
constraint.expression: entry.select(resource as Patient).identifier.where(type.coding.code='MR' and value.trim().length() > 0).count() = 1

constraint.human: Every bundle should always have only 1 Medicaid CIN (i.e MA) Object within patient.identifier
constraint.expression: entry.select(resource as Patient).identifier.where(type.coding.code='MA' and value.trim().length() > 0).count() = 1

constraint.human: Every bundle should always have only 1 SSN (i.e SS) Object within patient.identifier
constraint.expression: entry.select(resource as Patient).identifier.where(type.coding.code='SS' and value.trim().length() > 0).count() <= 1

constraint.human: All elements of address should be present
constraint.expression:
entry.select(resource as Patient).
                    address.where(line.count() > 0
                        and city.trim().length() > 0
                        and state.trim().length() > 0
                        and postalCode.trim().length() > 0
                        and district.trim().length() > 0).count() > 0

constraint.human: birthDate should be a valid date
constraint.expression: entry.select(resource as Patient).birthDate.trim().length() = 10 and entry.select(resource as Patient).birthDate.trim().split('-').count() = 3

constraint.human: Gender should be present
constraint.expression: entry.select(resource as Patient).where(gender.exists() and gender.trim().length()).count() > 0

constraint.human: Gender Id should be present
constraint.expression: entry.select(resource as Patient).extension.where(url='http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-birthsex').count() > 0

constraint.human: Race & Ethnicity should be present
constraint.expression:
entry.select(resource as Patient).
                    extension.where(url='http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-race').exists()
                and entry.select(resource as Patient).
                    extension.where(url='http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-ethnicity').exists()

constraint.human: Communication should exist
constraint.expression: entry.select(resource as Patient).communication.exists()

constraint.human: MiddleName should be present
constraint.expression:
entry.select(resource as Patient).name
                    .extension.where(url.contains('middle-name'))
                    .value.trim().length()>0

constraint.human: Pronouns should be present
constraint.expression:
entry.select(resource as Patient).extension.where(url='http://shinny.org/us/ny/hrsn/ValueSet/SHINNYPersonalPronounsVS').exists()
            implies
            entry.select(resource as Patient).extension.where(url='http://shinny.org/us/ny/hrsn/ValueSet/SHINNYPersonalPronounsVS' and value.select($this as CodeableConcept).coding.code.exists()).exists()

constraint.human: If there is no component or hasMember element then either a value[x] or a data absent reason must be present
constraint.expression:
entry.select(resource as Observation).where(meta.profile.contains('shin-ny-observation-sexual-orientation')).exists()
                implies
                entry.select(resource as Observation).where(meta.profile.contains('shin-ny-observation-sexual-orientation'))
                    .where(value.exists() or dataAbsentReason.exists())
                    .count()=1

constraint.human: Checks for RI between Observation & child Observations
constraint.expression:
entry.select(resource as Observation)
                .exists(hasMember.exists()
                    and meta.profile.contains('shinny-observation-screening-response'))
        implies

        entry.select(resource as Observation)
                        .where(hasMember.exists()
                    and meta.profile.contains('shinny-observation-screening-response'))
        .hasMember.select(reference.split('/')[1])
        .union(
                entry.select(resource as Observation)
                        .where(hasMember.exists().not()
                    and meta.profile.contains('shinny-observation-screening-response')).id)
        .count() =
                entry.select(resource as Observation)
                        .where(hasMember.exists()
                    and meta.profile.contains('shinny-observation-screening-response'))
                        .hasMember.reference
                        .count()

constraint.human: Ensure that the Encounter resource has a class code; Ensure that the Encounter resource has a class code system
constraint.expression:
entry.select(resource as Encounter).class
                .all(code.exists() and system.exists())

constraint.human: Ensure that the Encounter resource has a status code
constraint.expression:
entry.select(resource as Encounter).type.coding
                .all(code.exists() and system.exists())

constraint.human: Ensure that all Encounters include a value for period.start.
constraint.expression:
entry.select(resource as Encounter)
                            .all(period.start.exists())

constraint.human: Ensure that all finished Encounters include a value for period.end.
constraint.expression:
entry.select(resource as Encounter)
                            .where(status.contains('finished'))
                            .all(period.end.exists())

constraint.human: SDOH Observations should have an Encounter
constraint.expression:
entry.select(resource as Observation).where(meta.profile.contains('shinny-observation-screening-response'))
                    .all(encounter.reference.exists())

constraint.human: SDOH Observations should have a Patient
constraint.expression:
entry.select(resource as Observation).where(meta.profile.contains('shinny-observation'))
                .all(subject.reference.exists())

constraint.human: Ensure that all Observation resources have screening code; Ensure that all Observation resources have screening code system
constraint.expression:
entry.select(resource as Observation).where(
                            code.coding.system.exists().not()
                            or
                            code.coding.code.not().exists().not())
                            .count() = 0

constraint.human: Ensure that all Observation categories have an SDOH code
constraint.expression:
entry.select(resource as Observation).where(meta.profile.contains('shinny-observation'))
                    .where(meta.profile.contains('shinny-observation-screening-response').not())
                    .all(category.coding.system
                            .exists($this.contains('SDOHCC-CodeSystemTemporaryCodes')))

constraint.human: SDOH Screening Observations should have an Patient
constraint.expression:
entry.select(resource as Observation)
                .where(meta.profile.contains('shinny-observation-screening') and hasMember.exists())
                .all(subject.reference.exists())

constraint.human: Ensure that all Observation Screening Responses have a language.
constraint.expression:
entry.select(resource as Observation)
                .where(meta.profile.contains('shinny-observation-screening-response') )
                .all(language.exists())

constraint.human: Ensure that all Observation Screening Responses have a category display.
constraint.expression:
entry.select(resource as Observation)
                            .where(meta.profile.contains('shinny-observation-screening-response') )
                            .category.coding.where( system.contains('/CodeSystem/observation-category').not() ).
                            all(display.exists())

constraint.human: Ensure that all Observation Screening Responses have a code code.
constraint.expression:
entry.select(resource as Observation)
                        .where(meta.profile.contains('shinny-observation-screening-response'))
                        .code.coding
                        .all(code.exists())

constraint.human: Ensure that all Observation Screening Responses have a code dispay.
constraint.expression:
entry.select(resource as Observation)
                    .where(meta.profile.contains('shinny-observation-screening-response'))
                    .code.coding
                    .all(display.exists())

constraint.human: Ensure that specific Observation Screening Responses have an interpretation.
constraint.expression:
entry.select(resource as Observation)
                            .where(meta.profile.contains('shinny-observation-screening-response'))
                            .where(derivedFrom.exists().not())
                            .all(interpretation.exists())

constraint.human: Ensure that all final assessments have a Condition identifier.
constraint.expression:
entry.select(resource as Observation).where(meta.profile.contains('shinny-observation-assessment') and status = 'final').exists()
                implies  entry.select(resource as Observation)
                                .where( meta.profile.contains('shinny-observation-assessment') and status = 'final' ).count()
                                = entry.select(resource as Condition).id.count()

constraint.human: Ensure that all final assessments have a Condition category SNOMED term.
constraint.expression:
entry.select(resource as Observation).where(meta.profile.contains('shinny-observation-assessment') and status='final').exists()
            implies
            entry.select(resource as Condition).count() 
                = entry.select(resource as Condition).select(code.coding)
                    .where(system.contains('http://snomed.info/sct'))
                    .count()
            and
            entry.select(resource as Condition).count() !=0

constraint.human: Ensure that all final assessments have a Condition ICD-10 term.
constraint.expression:
entry.select(resource as Observation).where(meta.profile.contains('shinny-observation-assessment') and status='final').exists()
            implies
            entry.select(resource as Condition).count() 
                = entry.select(resource as Condition).select(code.coding)
                    .where(system.contains('http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/icd-10-cm'))
                    .count()
            and
            entry.select(resource as Condition).count() !=0

constraint.human: Ensure that all Assessment Questionnaire bundles have a response to PatientAssessmentApproval.
constraint.expression:
entry.select(resource as QuestionnaireResponse).exists()
             implies
             entry.select(resource as QuestionnaireResponse).exists (

             (QuestionnaireResponse|repeat('Yes'|PatientAssessmentApproval)).select(item.where(answer.value.exists()).linkId.isDistinct()).allTrue()
                    or
                    (QuestionnaireResponse|repeat('No'|PatientAssessmentApproval)).select(item.where(answer.value.exists()).linkId.isDistinct()).allTrue()
             
             )

constraint.human: Ensure that all Assessment Questionnaire bundles with patient approval contain a Patient Assessment Outreach Date and a Patient Assessment Status.
constraint.expression:
entry.select(resource as QuestionnaireResponse).exists()
             implies
             entry.select(resource as QuestionnaireResponse).exists (

             (QuestionnaireResponse|repeat('Yes'|PatientAssessmentApproval)).select(item.where(answer.value.exists()).linkId.isDistinct()).allTrue()
                    and
              (QuestionnaireResponse|repeat(''|PatientAssessmentOutreachDate)).select(item.where(answer.value.exists()).linkId.isDistinct()).allTrue()
                    and
              (QuestionnaireResponse|repeat(''|PatientAssessmentOutreachStatus)).select(item.where(answer.value.exists()).linkId.isDistinct()).allTrue()
             
             )

constraint.human: Ensure that all Assessment Questionnaire bundles have a response to the service duplication indicators.
constraint.expression:
entry.select(resource as QuestionnaireResponse).exists()
             implies
             entry.select(resource as QuestionnaireResponse).exists (

             (QuestionnaireResponse|repeat('Yes'|PatientAssessmentApproval)).select(item.where(answer.value.exists()).linkId.isDistinct()).allTrue()
                    and
             (QuestionnaireResponse|repeat(''|EnhancedPopulationCheck)).select(item.where(answer.value.exists()).linkId.isDistinct()).allTrue()
                    and
             (QuestionnaireResponse|repeat(''|ServiceDuplicationCheck)).select(item.where(answer.value.exists()).linkId.isDistinct()).allTrue()
                    and
             (QuestionnaireResponse|repeat(''|ClinicalCriteriaCheck)).select(item.where(answer.value.exists()).linkId.isDistinct()).allTrue()
             
             )

constraint.human: Ensure that all Assessment Questionnaire bundles have a response to the service duplication indicators.
constraint.expression:
entry.select(resource as QuestionnaireResponse).exists()
             implies
             entry.select(resource as QuestionnaireResponse).exists (

             (QuestionnaireResponse|repeat('Yes'|PatientAssessmentApproval)).select(item.where(answer.value.exists()).linkId.isDistinct()).allTrue()
                    and
             (QuestionnaireResponse|repeat(''|CurrentHousingProgramRecipientIndicator)).select(item.where(answer.value.exists()).linkId.isDistinct()).allTrue()
                    and
             (QuestionnaireResponse|repeat(''|CurrentNutritionalEducationProgramRecipientIndicator)).select(item.where(answer.value.exists()).linkId.isDistinct()).allTrue()
                    and
             (QuestionnaireResponse|repeat(''|CurrentNutritionalServicesProgramRecipientIndicator)).select(item.where(answer.value.exists()).linkId.isDistinct()).allTrue()
                    and
             (QuestionnaireResponse|repeat(''|CurrentFoodServiceProgramRecipientIndicator)).select(item.where(answer.value.exists()).linkId.isDistinct()).allTrue()
                    and
             (QuestionnaireResponse|repeat(''|CurrentSNAPProgramRecipientIndicator)).select(item.where(answer.value.exists()).linkId.isDistinct()).allTrue()
                    and
             (QuestionnaireResponse|repeat(''|CurrentWICProgramRecipientIndicator)).select(item.where(answer.value.exists()).linkId.isDistinct()).allTrue()
                    and
             (QuestionnaireResponse|repeat(''|CurrentTANFProgramRecipientIndicator)).select(item.where(answer.value.exists()).linkId.isDistinct()).allTrue()
                    and
             (QuestionnaireResponse|repeat(''|CurrentTransportationProgramRecipientIndicator)).select(item.where(answer.value.exists()).linkId.isDistinct()).allTrue()
                    and
             (QuestionnaireResponse|repeat(''|MedicationRequiringRefrigerationIndicator)).select(item.where(answer.value.exists()).linkId.isDistinct()).allTrue()
                    and
             (QuestionnaireResponse|repeat(''|BreastMilkRequiringRefrigerationIndicator)).select(item.where(answer.value.exists()).linkId.isDistinct()).allTrue()
                    and
             (QuestionnaireResponse|repeat(''|ADLs/IADLsIndicator)).select(item.where(answer.value.exists()).linkId.isDistinct()).allTrue()
                    and
             (QuestionnaireResponse|repeat(''|MedicalRespiteRequirementsIndicator)).select(item.where(answer.value.exists()).linkId.isDistinct()).allTrue()
                    and
             (QuestionnaireResponse|repeat(''|ChildcareAssistanceIndicator)).select(item.where(answer.value.exists()).linkId.isDistinct()).allTrue()
             
             )

constraint.human: Assessment-Encounter should exist
constraint.expression:
entry.select(resource as Observation).where(meta.profile.contains('shinny-observation-assessment')).exists()
             implies
             entry.select(resource as Observation).where(meta.profile.contains('shinny-observation-assessment'))
                    .where(encounter.reference.exists().not())
                    .count()=0

constraint.human: Assessment-Subject should exist
constraint.expression:
entry.select(resource as Observation).where(meta.profile.contains('shinny-observation-assessment')).exists()
             implies
             entry.select(resource as Observation).where(meta.profile.contains('shinny-observation-assessment'))
                    .where(subject.reference.exists().not())
                    .count()=0

constraint.human: Ensure that all Service Requests have a quantity.
constraint.expression:
entry.select(resource as ServiceRequest).exists()
implies
entry.select(resource as ServiceRequest)
                            .all(quantity.value.exists())

constraint.human: Ensure that all Service Requests have a category code.
constraint.expression:
entry.select(resource as ServiceRequest).exists()
            implies
            entry.select(resource as ServiceRequest).(
                all(category.exists())
                and category.all(coding.exists())
                and category.coding.all(code.exists())
                )

constraint.human: Ensure that all Service Requests have an occurrence period start and end, or occurrence datetime.
constraint.expression:
entry.select(resource as ServiceRequest).exists()
            implies
            entry.select(resource as ServiceRequest).count() = 
            (
                entry.select(resource as ServiceRequest).where(occurrence is Period).select(occurrence)
                    .where(start and end).count()
                +
                entry.select(resource as ServiceRequest).where(occurrence is dateTime).count()
            )

constraint.human: Ensure that all Service Requests have a authored on date.
constraint.expression:
entry.select(resource as ServiceRequest).exists()
            implies
            entry.select(resource as ServiceRequest).all(authoredOn.exists())

constraint.human: Ensure that all tasks exists, have a statusReason If the Task.status is rejected, cancelled, on-hold, or failed.
constraint.expression:
entry.select(resource as Task).where(status = 'rejected' or  status = 'cancelled' or status = 'on-hold' or status = 'failed').exists()
            implies
            entry.select(resource as Task).where(status = 'rejected' or  status = 'cancelled' or status = 'on-hold' or status = 'failed')
                .all(statusReason.text.exists())

constraint.human: Ensure that all Tasks have a value for repetitions.
constraint.expression:
entry.select(resource as Task).exists()
            implies
            entry.select(resource as Task).all(restriction.repetitions.exists())

constraint.human: Ensure that all completed Tasks have an end execution period.
constraint.expression:
entry.select(resource as Task).where(status = 'completed').exists()
            implies
            entry.select(resource as Task).where(status = 'completed').all(executionPeriod.end.exists())

constraint.human: Ensure that all Tasks have a starting execution period.
constraint.expression:
entry.select(resource as Task).exists()
            implies
            entry.select(resource as Task).all(executionPeriod.start.exists())

constraint.human: Ensure that all Referral Questionnaire bundles have a response to PatientReferralApproval.
constraint.expression:
entry.select(resource as QuestionnaireResponse).exists()
             implies
             entry.select(resource as QuestionnaireResponse).exists (

             (QuestionnaireResponse|repeat('Yes'|PatientReferralApproval)).select(item.where(answer.value.exists()).linkId.isDistinct()).allTrue()
                    or
             (QuestionnaireResponse|repeat('No'|PatientReferralApproval)).select(item.where(answer.value.exists()).linkId.isDistinct()).allTrue()
             
             )

constraint.human: Ensure that all approved Referral Questionnaire bundles have a response to HRSNServiceProviderReferralOutreachDate.
constraint.expression:
entry.select(resource as QuestionnaireResponse).exists()
             implies
             entry.select(resource as QuestionnaireResponse).exists (

             (QuestionnaireResponse|repeat('Yes'|PatientReferralApproval)).select(item.where(answer.value.exists()).linkId.isDistinct()).allTrue()
                    and
             (QuestionnaireResponse|repeat(''|HRSNServiceProviderReferralOutreachDate)).select(item.where(answer.value.exists()).linkId.isDistinct()).allTrue()
             
             )

constraint.human: Ensure that all approved Referral Questionnaire bundles have a response to SCNReferralOutreachDate.
constraint.expression:
entry.select(resource as QuestionnaireResponse).exists()
             implies
             entry.select(resource as QuestionnaireResponse).exists (

             (QuestionnaireResponse|repeat('Yes'|PatientReferralApproval)).select(item.where(answer.value.exists()).linkId.isDistinct()).allTrue()
                    and
             (QuestionnaireResponse|repeat(''|SCNReferralOutreachDate)).select(item.where(answer.value.exists()).linkId.isDistinct()).allTrue()
             
             )

constraint.human: Every bundle should always have one and only one 'Patient' & 'Encounter' and atleast one Org
constraint.expression:
entry.select(resource as Patient).count() = 1
                    and entry.select(resource as Encounter).count() = 1
                    and entry.select(resource as Organization).count() > 0

constraint.human: Every submitted resource should be part of a bundle.
constraint.expression: select($this as Bundle).exists()

constraint.human: Checks for RI between Patient & Assigning Org
constraint.expression:
entry.select(resource as Organization).id
                contains
                entry.select(resource as Patient)
                    .identifier.where(type.coding.code='MR')
                    .assigner.reference.split('/')[1]

constraint.human: Checks for RI between Patient & Encounter
constraint.expression:
entry.select(resource as Encounter).subject.reference.split('/')[1]
                    = entry.select(resource as Patient).id

constraint.human: Checks for RI between Encounter & Location
constraint.expression:
entry.select(resource as Location).exists() 
            implies 
            entry.select(resource as Encounter).location.location.reference.split('/')[1]
                        = entry.select(resource as Location).id

constraint.human: Checks for RI between Observation & child Observation
constraint.expression:
entry.select(resource as Observation)
                .where(derivedFrom.exists() and
                        (meta.where(profile.lower().contains('shinny-observation'))
                                or meta.where(profile.lower().contains('sdohcc-observation'))))
        .derivedFrom.select(reference.split('/')[1])
        .intersect(
                entry.select(resource as Observation).where(derivedFrom.empty().not() and
                        (meta.where(profile.lower().contains('shin-ny-observation-screening-response'))
                                or meta.where(profile.lower().contains('sdohcc-observationscreeningresponse')))).id)
        .count() =
                entry.select(resource as Observation)
                        .where(derivedFrom.exists() and
                                (meta.where(profile.lower().contains('shin-ny-observation-screening-response'))
                                        or $this.meta.where(profile.lower().contains('sdohcc-observationscreeningresponse'))))
                        .derivedFrom.reference
                        .count()

constraint.human: Checks for RI between Obs & Patient
constraint.expression:
entry.select(resource as Observation)
                .where(encounter.reference.exists() and meta.profile.contains('shinny-observation')).count()>1
                implies
                entry.select(resource as Observation)
                .where(encounter.reference.exists() and meta.profile.contains('shinny-observation'))
                .encounter.reference.distinct()
                .contains(entry.select(resource as Encounter).id)

constraint.human: Checks for RI between Screening Obs & Encounter
constraint.expression:
entry.select(resource as Observation)
                        .exists(encounter.reference.exists()
                        and meta.profile.contains('shinny-observation-screening-response'))
                implies 
                entry.select(resource as Observation)
                        .where(encounter.reference.exists()
                        and meta.profile.contains('shinny-observation-screening-response'))
                        .select(encounter.reference.split('/')[1]).distinct()
                 = entry.select(resource as Encounter).id

                                code='LA18876-5' or
                                code='LA18891-4' or

constraint.human:
If the ObservationScreeningResponse LOINC question code is 97027-7 then answer codes must be one of the following:
LA33-6
LA32-8
constraint.expression:
entry.select(resource as Observation).where(code.coding.code contains '97027-7').exists() implies
                    entry.select(resource as Observation).where(code.coding.code contains '97027-7').dataAbsentReason.exists()
                    or
                    entry.select(resource as Observation).where(code.coding.code contains '97027-7')
                        .value.select($this as CodeableConcept).coding
                        .where(code='LA33-6' or
                                code='LA32-8').exists()

constraint.human: Patient Consent category code is 59284-0
constraint.expression: entry.select(resource as Consent).exists() implies entry.select(resource as Consent).category.coding.where(code='59284-0').exists()

                        and district.trim().length() > 0).count() > 0

constraint.human: Ensure that all Organization resources include all address elements.
constraint.expression:
entry.select(resource as Organization).

                        and state.trim().length() > 0

element.definition: The date/time that the bundle was assembled - i.e. when the resources were placed in the bundle.
element.comment:
For many bundles, the timestamp is equal to .meta.lastUpdated, because they are not stored (e.g. search results). When a bundle is placed in a persistent store, .meta.lastUpdated will be usually be changed by the server. When the bundle is a message, a middleware agent altering the message (even if not stored) SHOULD update .meta.lastUpdated. .timestamp is used to track the original time of the Bundle, and SHOULD be populated.  

Usage:

* document : the date the document was created. Note: the composition may predate the document, or be associated with multiple documents. The date of the composition - the authoring time - may be earlier than the document assembly time
* message : the date that the content of the message was assembled. This date is not changed by middleware engines unless they add additional data that changes the meaning of the time of the message
* history : the date that the history was assembled. This time would be used as the _since time to ask for subsequent updates
* searchset : the time that the search set was assembled. Note that different pages MAY have different timestamps but need not. Having different timestamps does not imply that subsequent pages will represent or include changes made since the initial query
* transaction | transaction-response | batch | batch-response | collection : no particular assigned meaning

The timestamp value should be greater than the lastUpdated and other timestamps in the resources in the bundle, and it should be equal or earlier than the .meta.lastUpdated on the Bundle itself.

element.definition: The Etag for the resource, if the operation for the entry produced a versioned resource (see [Resource Metadata and Versioning](http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/http.html#versioning) and [Managing Resource Contention](http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/http.html#concurrency)).
element.comment: Etags match the Resource.meta.versionId. The ETag has to match the version id in the header if a resource is included.

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
constraint.expression: hasValue() or (children().count() > id.count())

element.definition: The date/time that the resource was modified on the server.
element.comment: This has to match the same time in the meta header (meta.lastUpdated) if a resource is included.

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
constraint.expression: hasValue() or (children().count() > id.count())

element.short: OperationOutcome with hints and warnings (for batch/transaction)
element.definition: An OperationOutcome containing hints and warnings produced as part of processing this entry in a batch or transaction.
element.comment:
For a POST/PUT operation, this is the equivalent outcome that would be returned for prefer = operationoutcome - except that the resource is always returned whether or not the outcome is returned.

This outcome is not used for error responses in batch/transaction, only for hints and warnings. In a batch operation, the error will be in Bundle.entry.response, and for transaction, there will be a single OperationOutcome instead of a bundle in the case of an error.

element.definition: Digital Signature - base64 encoded. XML-DSig or a JWT.
element.comment: The signature could be created by the "author" of the bundle or by the originating device.   Requirements around inclusion of a signature, verification of signatures and treatment of signed/non-signed bundles is implementation-environment specific.
element.requirements: A Signature holds an electronic representation of a signature and its supporting context in a FHIR accessible form. The signature may either be a cryptographic type (XML DigSig or a JWS), which is able to provide non-repudiation proof, or it may be a graphical image that represents a signature or a signature process. This element allows capturing signatures on documents, messages, transactions or even search responses, to support content-authentication, non-repudiation or other business cases. This is primarily relevant where the bundle may travel through multiple hops or via other mechanisms where HTTPS non-repudiation is insufficient.

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
constraint.expression: hasValue() or (children().count() > id.count())

constraint.human: Every bundle should always have only 1 MR (i.e MRN) Object within patient.identifier, system.contains('facility') and value (MRN) is provided
constraint.expression: entry.select(resource as Patient).identifier.where(type.coding.code='MR' and value.trim().length() > 0).count() = 1

constraint.human: Every bundle should always have only 1 Medicaid CIN (i.e MA) Object within patient.identifier
constraint.expression: entry.select(resource as Patient).identifier.where(type.coding.code='MA' and value.trim().length() > 0).count() = 1

constraint.human: Every bundle should always have only 1 SSN (i.e SS) Object within patient.identifier
constraint.expression: entry.select(resource as Patient).identifier.where(type.coding.code='SS' and value.trim().length() > 0).count() <= 1

constraint.human: All elements of address should be present
constraint.expression:

                    address.where(line.count() > 0
                        and city.trim().length() > 0
                        and state.trim().length() > 0
                        and postalCode.trim().length() > 0
                        and district.trim().length() > 0).count() > 0

constraint.human: Gender should be present
constraint.expression: entry.select(resource as Patient).where(gender.exists() and gender.trim().length()).count() > 0

constraint.human: Gender Id should be present
constraint.expression: entry.select(resource as Patient).extension.where(url='http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-birthsex').count() > 0

constraint.human: Race & Ethnicity should be present
constraint.expression:

                and entry.select(resource as Patient).
                    extension.where(url='http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-ethnicity').exists()

constraint.human: Communication should exist
constraint.expression: entry.select(resource as Patient).communication.exists()

constraint.human: MiddleName should be present
constraint.expression:

constraint.human: Pronouns should be present
constraint.expression:
entry.select(resource as Patient).extension.where(url='http://shinny.org/us/ny/hrsn/ValueSet/SHINNYPersonalPronounsVS').exists()
            implies
            entry.select(resource as Patient).extension.where(url='http://shinny.org/us/ny/hrsn/ValueSet/SHINNYPersonalPronounsVS' and value.select($this as CodeableConcept).coding.code.exists()).exists()

constraint.human: If there is no component or hasMember element then either a value[x] or a data absent reason must be present

entry.select(resource as Observation).where(meta.profile.contains('shin-ny-observation-sexual-orientation')).exists()
                implies
                entry.select(resource as Observation).where(meta.profile.contains('shin-ny-observation-sexual-orientation'))
                    .where(value.exists() or dataAbsentReason.exists())
                    .count()=1

constraint.human: Checks for RI between Observation & child Observations
constraint.expression:
entry.select(resource as Observation)
                .exists(hasMember.exists()
                    and meta.profile.contains('shinny-observation-screening-response'))
        implies

        entry.select(resource as Observation)
                        .where(hasMember.exists()
                    and meta.profile.contains('shinny-observation-screening-response'))
        .hasMember.select(reference.split('/')[1])
        .union(
                entry.select(resource as Observation)
                        .where(hasMember.exists().not()
                    and meta.profile.contains('shinny-observation-screening-response')).id)
        .count() =
                entry.select(resource as Observation)
                        .where(hasMember.exists()
                    and meta.profile.contains('shinny-observation-screening-response'))
                        .hasMember.reference
                        .count()

constraint.human: Checks for RI between Observation & child Observation
constraint.expression:
entry.select(resource as Observation)
                .where(derivedFrom.exists() and
                        (meta.where(profile.lower().contains('shinny-observation'))
                                or meta.where(profile.lower().contains('sdohcc-observation'))))
        .derivedFrom.select(reference.split('/')[1])
        .intersect(
                entry.select(resource as Observation).where(derivedFrom.empty().not() and
                        (meta.where(profile.lower().contains('shin-ny-observation-screening-response'))
                                or meta.where(profile.lower().contains('sdohcc-observationscreeningresponse')))).id)
        .count() =
                entry.select(resource as Observation)
                        .where(derivedFrom.exists() and
                                (meta.where(profile.lower().contains('shin-ny-observation-screening-response'))
                                        or $this.meta.where(profile.lower().contains('sdohcc-observationscreeningresponse'))))
                        .derivedFrom.reference
                        .count()
